content:
#21322 This PR (which @Ruben Van de Velde has approved) adds a small lemma about the interaction between insertion and iUnion.

There was the suggestion of changing the lemma iUnion_singleton_eq_range to allow for Sort indices rather than Type - this generalization itself works fine, but this expansion of the simpset causes simp regressions in much later files which I think require more serious thought, and are best left for a separate PR.

This is holding up #21172, so it would be nice to have it merged.
